## isParallelLine variable

2D only. Returns true if line `a`<!-- -->,`b` is parallel (or coincident) to line `c`<!-- -->,`d`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
isParallelLine: (a: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, b: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, c: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>, d: import("@thi.ng/api").ArrayLikeIterable<number>) => boolean
```
